title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Drawing Analogies - Deep Learning Strategies for Language Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic sentence structures and ability to use simple vocabulary
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can create analogy drawings that visually represent given language concepts (e.g., tense, conjunctions) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain the meaning of new words by connecting them to prior knowledge in three ways through analogical reasoning.
In small-group activities, learners can interpret peers’ drawing analogies, identify at least two linguistic similarities, and present their findings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
